articles.title: Meta’s Threads hits 175 million users one year after launch - The Verge
articles.description: Mark Zuckerberg’s rival to Elon Musk’s X is still growing a year later, though not as quickly. Now, Meta is focused on stealing more market share from X and preparing to turn on ads.
